headline: onsemi Withdraws Proposal to Acquire Allegro MicroSystems
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., April 14, 2025--onsemi (NASDAQ: ON) today announced that it has terminated its efforts to acquire Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. ("Allegro") (NASDAQ: ALGM) and withdrawn its all-cash proposal to acquire Allegro for $35.10 per share.

raw.headline: onsemi Withdraws Proposal to Acquire Allegro MicroSystems
raw.summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., April 14, 2025--onsemi (NASDAQ: ON) today announced that it has terminated its efforts to acquire Allegro MicroSystems, Inc. ("Allegro") (NASDAQ: ALGM) and withdrawn its all-cash proposal to acquire Allegro for $35.10 per share.
